EmailTemplate.name: Unapproved Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Estimate Unapproved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Account.Name},
Our team has been notified that {!Estimate__c.Estimate_Number__c} is not approved for the following reasons:
{!Estimate__c.Notes__c}
We will adjust the estimate as necessary and email it back for review. If you have any immediate questions please email your account rep at {!Opportunity.OwnerEmail}.
Thanks
